reg_info.act_under: Ontario Heritage Act   Loi sur le patrimoine de l’Ontario

content.content:
1. (1) The sites named in Column 1 of the Table are designated as historic sites. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 880, s. 1 (1). (2) An historic site consists of the land described in Column 2 of the Table. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 880, s. 1 (2). TABLE In this Table, “Schedule” means a schedule to Regulation 710 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1980, as it read on the 31st day of December, 1990, that bears the same number as the Schedule referred to in the Table.  Column 1

Column 2


Cahiague Historic Site

Schedule 1


The Penetanguishene Military and Naval Establishments Historic Site

Schedule 2


Willow Fort Historic Site

Schedule 3 R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 880, Table.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The sites named in Column 1 of the Table are designated as historic sites. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 880, s. 1 (1).

(2) An historic site consists of the land described in Column 2 of the Table. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 880, s. 1 (2).

TABLE

In this Table, “Schedule” means a schedule to Regulation 710 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1980, as it read on the 31st day of December, 1990, that bears the same number as the Schedule referred to in the Table.

Column 1

Column 2

Cahiague Historic Site

Schedule 1

Willow Fort Historic Site
